contents.text: Welcome to Townsquared, San Francisco's free local business community.
To learn about partnering with other local businesses, press 1.
To speak with our community partnerships team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our community partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Connect with the community partnerships team to discuss co-marketing opportunities with other local businesses.
Discuss partnering with local businesses to create veteran entrepreneurship programs
I want to set up an API-based co-marketing partnership with other local businesses.
I need help speaking with someone about collaborating with other local businesses.
I want to discuss partnering my university physics club with local businesses.

contents.text: To explore our business resource library and case studies, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve our business resources.

navigationGoals: Access the business resource library and case studies to review best practices for local growth.
Review business guides and case studies to support my veteran-owned startup
I’d like to access and download technical case studies from your business resource library.
I'm looking for business guides or case studies in your resource library.
I need to access case studies and resources for planning a student-led science startup.

contents.text: For neighborhood updates and local events, press 2.
To hear about upcoming community events, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our events announcement line.

navigationGoals: Get details on upcoming community events in my neighborhood.
Get info on upcoming community events, especially those for veterans
I need to integrate a real-time JSON or RSS feed of upcoming community events into my app.
I'd like information on upcoming neighborhood events.
I’m looking for information on upcoming community science events and seminars.

contents.text: To speak with our newsletter team, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our newsletter team.

navigationGoals: Subscribe to the Townsquared newsletter and confirm its delivery schedule.
Sign up for the newsletter to get neighborhood updates and veteran support resources
I want to subscribe to your newsletter and get the RSS/email webhook for automated updates.
I need assistance subscribing to your community newsletter.
I’d like to subscribe to the newsletter for regular updates on local science and community happenings.
